name: Space Fish Visits the Fair
description:
There are a lot of mysteries in the universe.

However this one is pretty clear.

Its a Space Fish who Visits the Fair!

- move to avoid Humans lest you get EXPOSED (for being a space fish)

- collect Balloons to take back as souvenirs!

- be a fish in Water

(Game is currently a prototype, current available build is unfinished. Possibly not going to be finished in the future.)
